abstract: The stock market took a beating last week, pulling the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index down by more than 10 percent for the year.
snippet: The stock market took a beating last week, pulling the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index down by more than 10 percent for the year.
lead_paragraph: The stock market took a beating last week, pulling the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index down by more than 10 percent for the year.

headline.main: A Rough Week in a Rough Year for Stocks
headline.print_headline: A Rough Week in a Rough Year for Stocks
